subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The Knicks, coached by Mike D’Antoni and led by Amar’e Stoudemire’s 23 points, trounced the struggling Suns.
snippet: The Knicks, coached by Mike D’Antoni and led by Amar’e Stoudemire’s 23 points, trounced the struggling Suns.
